name: Bossk's Mortar Gun
Lore: 'Relby-v10 micro grenade launcher. Modified version of the limited range CSPL ''Caspel'' Projectile Launcher. Blows lots of stuff up.',
Text: 'Use 2 Force to deploy on Bossk, 4 on any other warrior. May fire using 2 Force. Draw destiny. If destiny > 0, one card with that destiny number at same site is lost (your choice). If destiny = 0, mortar gun explodes and warrior firing it is lost.',
